Subskills.name: Afterslice
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to cast another scimitar.

Subskills.name: Sharpened Blade
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by flying scimitar.

Subskills.name: Flying Swarm
Subskills.description: Throw multiple smaller scimitars with decreased damage.

Subskills.name: Slice and Flight
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of flying scimitar.

Subskills.name: Widened Blade
Subskills.description: Increases the size of the scimitars.

Subskills.name: Blade's Vengeance
Subskills.description: Returning scimitars pull enemies towards you with a chance to slow them.

Subskills.name: Rupturing Flyby
Subskills.description: Chance on attack for flying scimitar to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Scimitar's Edge
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike chance when using flying scimitar.

Subskills.name: Orbital Blade Strike
Subskills.description: Scimitars are now spawned in a circle around the nomad with increased projectile speed and pulled back dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Maiming Scimitar
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by flying scimitar.

Subskills.name: Last Wish
Subskills.description: Flying scimitar now executes targets below a certain percentage of life.

Subskills.name: Sticking Blade
Subskills.description: Scimitars now attach to the first target for a short period dealing damage over time and returning back to the nomad.

Subskills.name: League of Nomad
Subskills.description: Scimitars now return to their spawning location. Successfully catching the returning scimitars increases your damage for a short period.
